entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lacombe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:18 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lacombe AAFC 3:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -22.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -32

Wind: SSE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
